FuncDef: This command enables a special ARP response mechanism in the system for ARP requests destined to static or dynamic hosts associated with the SAP. The system responds to each ARP request using the hosts MAC address as the both the source MAC address in the Ethernet header and the target hardware address in the ARP header.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the arp-reply-agent to discard ARP requests received on the MSAP that are targeted for a known host on the same MSAP with the same subscriber identification.
